title: Understanding Time-Outs
text: Time-outs are a strategy used to help individuals manage stress and emotions. They provide an opportunity to step away from a situation that may be overwhelming.

title: Purpose of Time-Outs
text: The main goal of a time-out is to allow the individual to regain composure and prevent escalation of stress or conflict.

hintAnswer: the client is offered a choice to withdraw from a stressful situation and go to another location
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes a time-out?
choices: a person’s understanding of their own culture and its impact on themselves
when everyone has a fair opportunity to obtain optimal health
imposition of one’s own values, beliefs, and practices upon another person or group
the client is offered a choice to withdraw from a stressful situation and go to another location
